code:
import hashlib

def calculate\_hash(algorithm, file\_path):
file\_hash = hashlib.new(algorithm)
with open(file\_path, 'rb') as file:
buffer = file.read(65536)
while len(buffer) > 0:
file\_hash.update(buffer)
buffer = file.read(65536)
return file\_hash.hexdigest()

print(calculate\_hash('md5', 'test.txt'))
print(calculate\_hash('sha256', 'test.txt'))
